QuestData.Title: Take the Bait
QuestData.Description:
The bait... almost gone now... must catch...
The crabs... find them... get more...
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Snapclaw Meat from Snapclaw crabs in Snapclaw Shore.
QuestData.RewardText:
Yes... more meat!
I must not... can not... stop!
